mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values(0, #{email}, #{name}, #{username}, #{oauth2_username}, #{password}, #{roles}, #{provider}, now(), now());
mapper.select: select usercode, email, name, username, oauth2_username, password, roles, provider, create_date, update_date from user_mst where username = #{username};
select usercode, email, name, username, oauth2_username, password, roles, provider, create_date, update_date from user_mst where oauth2_username = #{oauth2_username};
